channel.title: HybridScape Development
channel.description:
[center] [size=30pt][b]HybridScape[/b][/size] [size=15pt]Current status: General planning & basic networking implementations[/size] [/center]
HybridScape source will be written from scratch, using the MINA networking API.
The team (currently active members bold):
[ul][li][b]m.dog311[/b][/li] [li][b]Davidi2[/b][/li] [li][b]John459[/b][/li] [li]Evil_[/li] [li]Miss Silabsoft[/li] [li][i]Tekk - Will occasionally contribute codons[/i][/li][/ul]
Update logs:
[ul][li]December 7 [list] [li]Basic MINA implementation is done.[/li] [li]SQLite implemented[/li] [li]Fixed packaging[/li] [li]ISAAC Cipher added[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]December 8 [list] [li]SQL implemented[/li] [/list] [/li][/ul]
IRC: [url=http://chat.strictfp.com/?channels=hybridscape]#hybridscape on StrictFP[/url]

item.description:

Davidi2:

If he says it’s OK, I will tell you guys.

Might as well tell them.

To be honest, his contributions were shit(looked like a remake of Winterlove). He also deleted some of the work mdog had posted in the svn.

EDIT: Rix, you’re still cool.

item.title: HybridScape Development

item.description:

[quote author=IlikeArrays link=topic=468369.msg3424245#msg3424245 date=1291776407]
Should not be an owner. Just put up an svn and whoever puts effort into it can call it part theirs.
[/quote]I agree.

Why was Rix taken off.
[/quote]I’m not going to comment.

Can you? Im curious[/quote]

Read full topic
